name: Classic Brownies
steps: Preheat oven to 175°C.
Melt the cannabutter over low heat, then stir in sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
Mix in cocoa, flour, salt, and baking powder, then spread in a greased pan.
Bake for 20-25 minutes. Let cool before cutting.

name: Cannabis Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 175°C.
Cream together the cannabutter, sugar, and vanilla extract.
Beat in the egg, then mix in the flour, baking soda, and salt.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Weed-Infused Lemonade
ingredients: 5 grams cannabis (infused into the water for simple syrup)
steps: Infuse the cannabis into 1 cup of water by heating gently for about 30 minutes.
Combine the sugar and infused water to make a simple syrup.
Mix the syrup with lemon juice and 4 cups of cold water.
Stir well and chill before serving.

name: Cannabis-Infused Caramel Sauce
steps: Melt the cannabis-infused butter over medium heat.
Add the sugar and stir until it melts and starts to bubble.
Slowly add the heavy cream and whisk to combine.
Continue to cook for about 5 minutes, then stir in vanilla extract.
Let cool and pour over ice cream, brownies, or other desserts.

name: Weed-Infused Chocolate Fudge
steps: Melt the cannabutter and dark chocolate in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
Stir in the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, and salt.
Pour the mixture into a lined pan and refrigerate until firm (about 2-3 hours).
Cut into squares and serve.

name: Cannabis-Infused Rice Krispies Treats
steps: Melt the cannabutter in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Add the marshmallows and stir until melted.
Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract.
Add the Rice Krispies and stir until well coated.
Press the mixture into a greased pan and let cool before cutting into squares.

name: Weed-Infused Cinnamon Rolls
steps: Combine yeast, warm milk, and sugar. Let sit for 5 minutes until foamy.
Mix in flour, salt, cannabutter, and egg. Knead the dough for 5-7 minutes.
Let dough rise for 1 hour.
Roll out dough and sprinkle with cinnamon and brown sugar.
Roll up the dough, slice into 10 rolls, and place in a greased pan.
Bake at 180°C for 15-20 minutes. Let cool before serving.

name: Weed-Infused Apple Pie
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix the apples with sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice.
Melt the cannabutter and pour it over the apple mixture.
Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and cover with the second crust.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, until golden brown.

name: Weed-Infused Strawberry Shortcake
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix the dry ingredients (flour, baking powder, salt, sugar).
Add melted cannabutter and milk to form a dough.
Scoop the dough into small mounds on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Top with sliced strawberries and whipped cream.

name: Cannabis-Infused Panna Cotta
steps: Melt the cannabis-infused cream and mix with milk, sugar, and vanilla.
Dissolve the gelatin in a small amount of cold water, then add it to the cream mixture.
Pour into molds and refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Serve chilled.

name: Weed-Infused Guacamole
steps: Mash the avocados in a bowl.
Add the cannabis-infused olive oil, red onion, lime juice, salt, and black pepper.
Stir in the diced tomato and jalapeño.
Chill for 30 minutes and serve with tortilla chips.

name: Weed-Infused Popcorn
steps: Pop the popcorn kernels using your preferred method (stovetop or popcorn machine).
Melt the cannabis-infused butter and drizzle over the popped popcorn.
Sprinkle with salt and toss to coat evenly.
Serve warm.
